Q_DESC:
"Virat loves mathematical questions. The other day he came across an interesting question which required him to find out the number of trailing zeroes for the
function. F(n) = 11*22......NN,where N is an integer. Virat solved the problem after a few attempts. He asked the same
question from his friend Rohit to see if he can solve it. Rohit couldnt arrive at a solution and has asked for your help. Can you help him out?
Input                                           Each line contains a single integer N
Output                                    output a single line containing a single integer which denotes the number of trailing zeroes for the value of the function computed for
N.
"
